name: SB Consult
bossPosition: Senior Advisor, Government and Regulatory Affairs, for AIMA
goal:
The purpose of my consultancy firm is to provide three types of services in the context of the EU policies.
First, the objective is to provide research papers that can contribute to feed the debate on specific policy issues.
Secondly, the objective is to help federations and firms define their positioning on critical issues. This entails the attendance of different meetings at the European Parliament in order to understand the latest progress on specific files.
Finally, the objective is to facilitate meetings with key stakeholders in Brussels. This could also be done via the organisation of well targeted events.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
-Alternative Investment Fund Manager Directive (AIFMD)
-Payment Service Directive 2
-Consumer Credit Directive
-Capital Ratio Directive 5
-Cybersecurity Package
-GDPR
-NIS Directive
-Credit Service Directive
